title: Question 25
prompt: Elevator mechanics install, repair, or maintain elevators in residential or commercial settings. They also perform routine service on elevators to ensure that they are operating in a safe manner.  Proper inspections of elevators can prevent accidents, and more importantly, save lives.  _____________________
description: Read the paragraph. Then choose the sentence that best fills the blank in the paragraph.
feedback: The correct answer is “Elevator mechanics play a key role when it comes to elevator maintenance and safety.” This sentence concludes the paragraph by summarizing the ideas, whereas the other choices do not.  The correct answer connects together all the ideas in the paragraph.
